程序包 cn.wuqinxuan.numbercruncher.mathutils

类 RootFinder

  • java.lang.Object
    • cn.wuqinxuan.numbercruncher.mathutils.RootFinder
  • 直接已知子类:
    BisectionRootFinder, FixedPointRootFinder, NewtonsRootFinder, RegulaFalsiRootFinder, SecantRootFinder

    public abstract class RootFinder
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract base class for the root finder classes.

        Constructor.

    • 方法详细资料

      • checkInterval

        public void checkInterval​(float x1,
                          float x2)
                   throws RootFinder.InvalidIntervalException
        Check the interval.
        参数:
        xMin - x-coordinate of the left of the interval
        xMax - x-coordinate of the right end of the interval
        抛出:
        RootFinder.InvalidIntervalException

      • getIterationCount

        public int getIterationCount​()
        Return the iteration count.
        返回:
        the count

      • step

        public boolean step​()
             throws RootFinder.IterationCountExceededException,
                    RootFinder.PositionUnchangedException
        Perform one iteration step.
        返回:
        true if the algorithm converged, else false
        抛出:
        RootFinder.IterationCountExceededException
        RootFinder.PositionUnchangedException

      • checkIterationCount

        protected void checkIterationCount​()
                            throws RootFinder.IterationCountExceededException
        Check the iteration count to see if it has exeeded the maximum number of iterations.
        抛出:
        RootFinder.IterationCountExceededException

        protected void reset​()
        Reset.

      • doIterationProcedure

        Do the iteration procedure.
        参数:
        n - the iteration count

        Compute the next position of x.

        抛出:

      • hasConverged

        protected abstract boolean hasConverged​()
        Indicate whether or not the algorithm has converged.
        返回:
        true if converged, else false
